segments.text: Could I be of any help to you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to buy a skirt , but I have no idea which one to buy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you like miniskirt ? It's popular among young girls . The pleated skirt also sells well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't like to keep up with joneses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think this suits me . Can I try it on ?
segments.speaker: S2
